extendedInfo.description: Big Brother 15 is here! Yes, there are spoilers. Use Pocket Big Brother to keep up with the latest updates. Updates are provided by Survivor Sucks and JokersUpdates. Also, get the latest tweets from the current HOH, as they send their thoughts to twitter.Features Include -2 separate updates feeds (jokersupdates,survivor sucks), with possibly more to be added. -Drill down the view the original post on the web. -Twitter support, media, and former house guests.

reviews.title: Why is it lagging so far behind ios version
reviews.comment: The same app on iPhones shows the hoh and the noms and veto.  Seriously, why is this app so far behind the iPhone version?
reviews.author: Phillip Meyers

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: This version is so inadequate compared to the ios version. Why does it lack the homepage that easily showd HOH and nominees? Please add that and I would add more stars.
reviews.author: Dawn Bradley

reviews.title: Update please
reviews.comment: So far behind compared to the IOS app. I want to the HOH and picks for the week on the main page
reviews.author: MICHELLE HASELDEN

reviews.title: HONEYLIOUS
reviews.comment: I LOVE THIS SHOW
reviews.author: Ramona Ross

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work properly unless you have an iPhone
reviews.comment: I have a Droid and my sister has an iPhone. Her app shows hoh, noms, etc at a glance... the ONLY thing I get off this app is reading the last 10 or so updates from jokersupdates. Pleeeeease update this app to work the way it was intended on ALL phones!
reviews.author: Jennifer S

reviews.title: separate but not equal
reviews.comment: The same app on apple devises shows hoh, noms and pic winner on the front page of the app as well as a verify description of what is going on. Is there a reason this app can\'t do the same thing?
reviews.author: Brayden Murray

reviews.title: My opinion
reviews.comment: I love this app its the best
reviews.author: Chastity Phoenix

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Please fix so it compares to the iPhone app!
reviews.author: Katy LaCourse

reviews.title: Was Great to have BB 24/7 on my phone thru BB spies blogging
reviews.comment: But now that season is over I\'m uninstalling Thanks can\'t wait for next seasons version -Nexus S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why even bother???
reviews.comment: The iphone app is great but this android app is a far cry from that.  The only useful feature is reading Joker\'s updates.  Pretty silly since the Android market is significantly larger than the iOS market... SMH
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best joker updates reader on market... Not saying much really
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: I thought it would be like the ipod version and it\'s not at all. Doesn\'t contain any of the spoilers (NOMS/HOH/POV etc...) uninstalling. Lame!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy!
reviews.comment: This was great for checking Jokers Updates & various Twitter feeds during BB13...works perfectly on HTC Inspire!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sucks
reviews.comment: This app is better on iphone! This version sucks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It won\'t work for me. I have a backflip.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Couldn\'t do without
reviews.comment: Love it! Check in and read it all day..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is horrible. Nothing opens. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No cost gossip
reviews.comment: I love having the edge with my friends and family because of the insights I get from this app. Love it!!!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Updates Jokers before I\'m ready, it would be nice to be able to control the refreshing. Otherwise great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get it
reviews.comment: The iPhone version is so much better. I expected it to look like that but it was nothing like it
reviews.author: A Google User
